name: cloverleaf-ref

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: ieee
variants.description: Build with IEEE754 compliant floating point operations

description:
Proxy Application. CloverLeaf_ref is a miniapp that solves the
compressible Euler equations on a Cartesian grid, using an explicit,
second-order accurate method.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)
